snippet.title: A New 100-GHz Band Two-Beam Sideband-Separating SIS Receiver for Z-Machine on the NRO 45-m Radio Telescope
snippet.description: A New 100-GHz Band Two-Beam Sideband-Separating SIS Receiver for Z-Machine on the NRO 45-m Radio Telescope / Nakajima, Taku ; Kimura, Kimihiro ; Nishimura, Atsushi ; Iwashita, Hiroyuki ; Miyazawa, Chieko ; Sakai, Takeshi ; Iono, Daisuke ; Kohno, Kotaro ; Kawabe, Ryohei ; Kuno, Nario et al. We have developed a two-beam waveguide-type dual-polarization sideband-separating SIS receiver system in the 100-GHz band for {\it z}-machine on the 45-m radio telescope at the Nobeyama Radio Observatory. [...] arXiv:1302.0575. \- 2013\. Preprint

snippet.title: Isentropic Compression of Nitroplastized Estane to $\approx$ 35 KBAR on the Sandia Z-Machine
snippet.description: Isentropic Compression of Nitroplastized Estane to $\approx$ 35 KBAR on the Sandia Z-Machine / Gustavsen, R L ; Dattelbaum, D M ; Orler, E B ; Hooks, D E ; Alcon, R R ; Sheffield, S A ; Hall, C E ; Baer, M R 2006 \- Published in : AIP Conf. Proc.: 845 (2006) , pp. 149-152 External link: Published version from AIP In : Conference of the American Physical Society Topical Group on Shock Compression of Condensed Matter, Baltimore, MD, USA, 31 Jul - 5 Aug 2005, pp.149-152

snippet.title: Radio-mm-FIR Photometric Redshifts for (sub-)mm Galaxies
snippet.description: Radio-mm-FIR Photometric Redshifts for (sub-)mm Galaxies / Aretxaga, I ; Hughes, D H ; Dunlop, J S We present a comparison between the published optical, IR and CO spectroscopic redshifts of 86 (sub-)mm galaxies and their photometric redshifts as derived from long-wavelength radio-mm-FIR photometric data. [...] astro-ph/0702509. \- 2007\. Access to fulltext document \- Access to fulltext document

snippet.title: Weighing Black Holes in high-z SCUBA Galaxies
snippet.description: Weighing Black Holes in high-z SCUBA Galaxies / Alexander, D M Deep SCUBA surveys have uncovered a population of dust-enshrouded star-forming galaxies at z~2. [...] astro-ph/0612499. \- 2006\. - 7 p. Access to fulltext document \- Access to fulltext document

snippet.title: Z-machines conference proceeding: Future continuum surveys
snippet.description: Z-machines conference proceeding: Future continuum surveys / Blain, A W A significant population of distant sub-millimeter-selected galaxies (SMGs) with powerful dust continuum emission that matches the luminosity of the brightest QSOs and exceeds that of most extreme local galaxies detected by IRAS, has been known for almost a decade. [...] astro-ph/0607448. \- 2006\. - 10 p. Access to fulltext document \- Access to fulltext document

snippet.title: Z-machine science other than CO - scientific and technical prospects for very wide band-width radio and (sub)millimeter-wavelength spectroscopy
snippet.description: Z-machine science other than CO - scientific and technical prospects for very wide band-width radio and (sub)millimeter-wavelength spectroscopy / Menten, K M While clearly the main scientific targets of ''z-machines" will be redshifted lines of carbon monoxide, there also exist other interesting applications. [...] astro-ph/0603628. \- 2006\. - 10 p. Access to fulltext document \- Access to fulltext document

snippet.title: MUSYC: A Deep Square Degree Survey of the Formation and Evolution of Galaxies and Supermassive Black Holes
snippet.description: MUSYC: A Deep Square Degree Survey of the Formation and Evolution of Galaxies and Supermassive Black Holes / Gawiser, E The Multiwavelength Survey by Yale-Chile (MUSYC) is optimized for the study of galaxies at z=3, AGN demographics, and Galactic structure.
